title: How to Make a French 75 Cocktail

steps.headline: Add water and sugar to a small saucepan over medium heat.
steps.description: Use equal parts sugar and syrup.

steps.headline: Keep stirring until the sugar is totally dissolved.
Reduce heat and simmer the mixture for 5 minutes.
Remove the saucepan from heat and wait the syrup to cool to room temperature.
Pour the syrup into a jar, and seal tightly after using.
Wash the lemon to clean it, and then wipe it dry.
Slice the peel from one end to the other with a zester or paring knife.
steps.description: Make sure the strips are about 5cm long.

steps.headline: Cut the rolled peel parallel to its outside, not perpendicularly.
Add all ingredients except champagne to a shaker.
Add enough ice to the shaker.
Cap the shaker.
steps.description: Shake the shaker vigorously for about 20 seconds.

steps.headline: Strain the mixture into a highball glass.
Garnish the glass with the self-made lemon twist.

text: Making the Simple Syrup Add water and sugar to a small saucepan over medium heat. Use equal parts sugar and syrup. Keep stirring until the sugar is totally dissolved.  Reduce heat and simmer the mixture for 5 minutes.  Remove the saucepan from heat and wait the syrup to cool to room temperature.  Pour the syrup into a jar, and seal tightly after using.  Making the Lemon Twist Wash the lemon to clean it, and then wipe it dry.  Slice the peel from one end to the other with a zester or paring knife. Make sure the strips are about 5cm long. Roll the lemon peel tightly.  Cut the rolled peel parallel to its outside, not perpendicularly.  Making the 75 Cocktail Add all ingredients except champagne to a shaker.  Add enough ice to the shaker.  Cap the shaker. Shake the shaker vigorously for about 20 seconds. Strain the mixture into a highball glass.  Top the glass with champagne.  Garnish the glass with the self-made lemon twist.  Finished.
